channel.title: [Notorious Reborn]RuneSpark
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://runespark.com/logo.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7jyoZuU.png[/img][SIZE=4]Website: [URL=http://"http://runespark.com"]Click Here[/URL].[/SIZE][/CENTER]
Notorious is back, but with something even better, an actually caring owner! Join back and play with your fellow players and veterans, who've all come to play Runespark, otherwise known as Notorious-Reborn!
We have all of the same bosses, skills, humorous moments of the game and now you can play again. Come on and play with previous staff members, including [B]Flnal Wlsh[/B], [B]Say Waah[/B], [B]Ken1sdead[/B], And more! Runespark has achieved over 20 players in a span of 10 minutes upon release, join while you still can and while the good times are still rolling!
[B][U][SIZE=4]Features[/SIZE][/U][/B]
[ul][*]Server Stability improved [*]Active Community Forums [*]Social Slayer [*]Dwarf Cannon [*]Improved Item Switching [*]Improved Combat System [*]Fullscreen/Resizable [*]Daily Updates [*]Dedicated Staff Members [*]Many bosses to fight [*]Many minigames to enjoy [*]Small Cache Size [*]Intermediate experience rates(Not to slow, not to hard) [*]Max cape for maxed out users [*]100% Working Clanchat [*]And much more, come login and see.[/ul]
[B][U][SIZE=4]Why should you choose RuneSpark?[/SIZE][/U][/B] RuneSpark's staff members are dedicated to the server and they care about the community. We care about bringing our players an excellent gaming experience. We care about how the server is ran, in terms of management. At RuneSpark, we do everything we possibly can to ensure our community members enjoy playing the server, and enjoy the updates we produce for you all. Our goal is to bring a fun and enjoyable game for the community.
[SPOILER=Server Media][img]http://puu.sh/g76cD/b1e9e6a363.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/g760e/d01aff32e3.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/g7624/c9ac695b07.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/g763z/3857f3218b.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/g764s/c1d693185f.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/g768k/309fd501f2.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/g769K/96b23dd504.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/g76ew/52ac340d2b.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/g76h8/fd3daf3463.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/g76jg/946f9280d7.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/g76kL/4704d2a58d.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/g76mS/79bcc27fd2.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/g76nM/898db4b14f.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/g76tD/a7433d6fce.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/g77wA/8b7a64e573.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/g77oX/b0219645f9.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/g77zE/3f3bb2be34.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/g77Ct/23241e5977.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/g77G3/9488bfcd9d.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/g77Im/4a869cd422.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/g77YM/0aeec6557c.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/g781u/14b6f24563.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/g784L/d8a444760d.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/g786I/6014d85914.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/g7eq1/20f1acefca.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/g7esm/38307b6736.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/g7ezx/66475af711.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/g7eBg/660e270686.png[/img][/SPOILER]

item.title: [Notorious Reborn]RuneSpark
item.dc:creator: @angelfallen angelfallen
item.description:
@angelfallen wrote:

[CENTER]
[SIZE=4]Website: [URL=http://“http://runespark.com”]Click Here[/URL].[/SIZE][/CENTER]

Notorious is back, but with something even better, an actually caring owner! Join back and play with your fellow players and veterans, who’ve all come to play Runespark, otherwise known as Notorious-Reborn!

We have all of the same bosses, skills, humorous moments of the game and now you can play again. Come on and play with previous staff members, including [B]Flnal Wlsh[/B], [B]Say Waah[/B], [B]Ken1sdead[/B], And more!
Runespark has achieved over 20 players in a span of 10 minutes upon release, join while you still can and while the good times are still rolling!

[B][U][SIZE=4]Features[/SIZE][/U][/B]

[ul][]Server Stability improved
[]Active Community Forums
[]Social Slayer
[]Dwarf Cannon
[]Improved Item Switching
[]Improved Combat System
[]Fullscreen/Resizable
[]Daily Updates
[]Dedicated Staff Members
[]Many bosses to fight
[]Many minigames to enjoy
[]Small Cache Size
[]Intermediate experience rates(Not to slow, not to hard)
[]Max cape for maxed out users
[]100% Working Clanchat
[]And much more, come login and see.[/ul]

[B][U][SIZE=4]Why should you choose RuneSpark?[/SIZE][/U][/B]
RuneSpark’s staff members are dedicated to the server and they care about the community. We care about bringing our players an excellent gaming experience. We care about how the server is ran, in terms of management. At RuneSpark, we do everything we possibly can to ensure our community members enjoy playing the server, and enjoy the updates we produce for you all. Our goal is to bring a fun and enjoyable game for the community.
